comments: Dr. Durivage does everything he can to make sure that you learn the material. He is knowledgeable about the subject, and truly makes it interesting. His science tattoos are fun, too!
Took this class fall of 2011. Do the work, come to class, pay attention and you\'ll do fine. I really liked him as a teacher, and he actually made me like chemistry. Thanks Dr. Durivage!

I\'m Asian and have some chem basis => he\'s very easy grader, you\'ll get A. But have to admit he\'s boring. If U can\'t pull any chem out of your memory from high school, then he\'s not clear at all although he\'s very helpful and nice. Don\'t buy book for his class, u\'ll never use it, ppt printing is just enough.
He is a really great teacher. Ask questions and he will help you. He makes his students interact, and clarifies everything asked. Really great teacher overall.

Jason is a really nice teacher. Chemistry is no easy subject, but he explains everything thouroughly. Sometimes he can get confusing but if you ask questions he clarifies stuff. As long as you are there to complete labs and study for quizzes and exams no one should fail. Even if Jason doesnt clarify enough for someone there are tutors on campus.

SUPER HARD!!! Doesn\'t explain things! He expects us to know how to work the problem with out even explaining to us why a problem is set up the way it is, what buttons to use on the scientific calculator, and how we got some answers. It is close to impossible to get an A in any of his tests because they are just plain hard. Don\'t recommend him!

DO NOT TAKE THIS TEACHER. I only wished I had looked him up before I registered for this class. It was the most boring class I have ever had and he doesnt explain ANYTHING. He grades really hard and expects you to just know everything. My book taught me everything.
hard class he do not explain how to do the examples the test are very hard, he leaves a lot of homework
is the mos boring class i have taken
Waste of time. Doesn\'t explain labs. Boring lectures. Might as well take it online.
